column5: Hey guys, if i am posting this in the wrong area i appologize.I am looking at a 1997 Crestliner Pro am 1850 it has a 115 hp johnson fast strike,bow mount trolling motor and comes with a lcx 15 mt gps fishfinder combo any ideas on what it is worth?? looks to be in good shape.Any feedback would be greatly appreciated...thanks
Maximum $9,000 - $9,500 IMO and that would be top dollar.  Although I'm not sure what the boat is rated for, 115 sounds light for an 18.5 footer.  Check kijiji for comparables.
